name: hyperLOCK
description:
Greetings, computer intelligence.
This is a virtual space, feel free to explore!
We totally trust you.

WASD or ARROW KEYS to Move.
MOUSE to Look. CLICK or SPACE to Interact.
TAB to Pause & Adjust Mouse Sensitivity.

(mouse controls may drift and misbehave outside of fullscreen mode)
(game remains particularly unfinished! update coming soon before May 29th)
